Key Match Events: Lesotho and Benin played to a 0-0 draw at the Moses Mabhida Stadium, with Motlomelo Mkwanazi scoring for Lesotho in the 63rd minute, but Junior Olaitan equalizing for Benin in the 86th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho are on a three-match winless streak, having drawn one and lost two, including a 1-0 defeat against Zambia in the COSAFA Cup final. Benin, on the other hand, have not won in their last 13 matches across all competitions, losing eight and drawing five.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lesotho's Thabiso Brown is a doubt for the match due to injury, while Benin's Gernot Rohr's men have now failed to qualify for the last two editions of the AFCON tournament.
Others: Lesotho possible starting lineup: Moerane; Matsoele, Rasethuntsa, Mkwanazi, Mohai; Thaba-Ntso, Lebokollane, Lesaoana, Sefali; Bereng, Motebang. Benin possible starting lineup: Allagbe; Kiki, Hountondji, Moumini; Olaitan, D'Almeida, Kossi; Hountondji, Dossou, Mounie.
